\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 79020}

\subsection*{Fixes Stutter}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Ahmed}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated &  & MDMA & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 200.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have taken MDMA a few times a year and my stutter completely goes away for the duration.  I am not sure if it's because I am at total ease or because it actually does something neurologically, but all I can say is that I don't stutter at all.  Makes me wish I could take a smaller dose regularly just to avoid stuttering.  Though I doubt that is safe, so I won't try it, but I wish the medical profession took a look at this.

\end{document}
